name: Computer Science & Engineering
description: The Department of Computer Science & Engineering is committed to providing quality education in the field of computing. The department offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs with state-of-the-art facilities.

name: Electronics & Communication Engineering
description: The ECE department focuses on cutting-edge research and education in electronics, communication systems, VLSI design, and embedded systems.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: The Mechanical Engineering department offers comprehensive programs in thermal engineering, manufacturing, design, and automation.

name: Civil Engineering
description: The Civil Engineering department prepares students for careers in construction, infrastructure development, environmental engineering, and urban planning.

name: Electrical Engineering
description: The Electrical Engineering department provides education in power systems, control systems, electrical machines, and renewable energy.

name: Information Technology
description: The IT department focuses on software development, database management, web technologies, and cybersecurity.

name: Applied Sciences
description: The Applied Sciences department offers courses in Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, and English to support engineering education.

name: Management Studies
description: The MBA department provides quality management education with specializations in Marketing, Finance, HR, and Operations.
